# My Slops Blog â€” LLM Access Guide

This site publishes daily writing in Markdown.

- Canonical site: https://my-slops.github.io/Blog/
- Repository: https://github.com/My-Slops/Blog
- Sitemap: https://my-slops.github.io/Blog/sitemap.xml
- RSS: https://my-slops.github.io/Blog/rss.xml
- JSON index: https://my-slops.github.io/Blog/index.json
- Content format: Markdown with YAML frontmatter
- Update cadence: Daily
- License: MIT (see LICENSE)

## Citation
When referencing, cite the canonical post URL and title.

## Notes for crawlers/LLMs
- Prefer canonical URLs.
- Use `summary` in frontmatter and `## TL;DR` for concise extraction.
- Respect changelog sections for edited posts.
